/$
$
Live Music, Events & Dinner Shows in Ormond Beach - 31 Supper Club
/$
$
At 31 Supper Club, every week is filled with unforgettable moments. From Taco Tuesdays on the patio to high-energy dinner shows on the weekends, we bring Ormond Beach to life with live music, elevated dining, and craft cocktails just minutes from Daytona. Whether you’re planning a casual night out or a special celebration, it's more than dinner ---- it's a night to remember.
/$
$
Reserve Your Table
/$
/$
$
$
/$

Private Event Venue in Ormond Beach-- Host Your Wedding, Party, or Corporate Event in Style
/$
$
Host your next event in one of the most iconic venues in Ormond Beach, minutes from Daytona Beach. From elegant indoor dinners to lively outdoor celebrations under the stars, 31 Supper Club offers a full-service event experience in a one-of-a-kind Art Deco setting. Whether you’re planning a wedding, luncheon, corporate meeting, or milestone celebration, our team ensures every detail is flawless.
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$

Request Information
/$
$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
1
/$
$
/$
$
Venue Hire
/$
$
Two Stunning Spaces. Endless Possibilities for Private and semi-private bookings.
Just minutes from Daytona Beach, 31 Supper Club offers two flexible event spaces perfect for both celebrations and professional gatherings.
•
Main Dining Room
– Elegant and timeless, ideal for upscale dinners, weddings, and corporate luncheons or presentations.
•
Havana Bar Patio
– Covered, open-air setting with full bar, lush ambiance, and live music stage — perfect for mixers, client events, or casual networking.
​
From formal presentations to festive receptions, we tailor each space to your vision.
/$
/$
$
$
2
/$
$
/$
$
Catering
/$
$
Elevated Dining with a Custom Touch
Impress your guests with our chef-curated menus, featuring prime steaks, fresh seafood, shareable starters, and signature cocktails. Choose plated service, buffet, or passed hors d’oeuvres. We’ll help you design the perfect menu to match your event’s style, dietary needs, and guest count — all crafted with fresh ingredients and elevated presentation.
Perfect for upscale business luncheons or formal dinners.
/$
/$
$
$
3
/$
$
/$
$
Event Planning
/$
$
Stress-Free, Seamless, and Stylish
Let our experienced team bring your vision to life. We manage everything from floorplans, staffing, and décor to timing and flow. Whether it’s an intimate dinner or a large-scale celebration, you can relax knowing every detail is covered — effortlessly and professionally.
Corporate teams love our seamless coordination and professional presentation support.
/$
/$
$
$
4
/$
$
/$
$
Audio, Visual, Lighting &
Live Entertainment
/$
$
Your Event. Elevated.
From daytime presentations to evening celebrations, 31 Supper Club has everything you need:
•    Sound systems indoors and on the patio
•    Live music or DJ entertainment — including Grammy-nominated performers
•    Custom lighting + wireless mics for speakers
•    Projector on the covered Havana Patio for slideshows or branding
•    Large mobile TVs available for indoor presentations
•
Corporate
Event Venue in Ormond Beach minutes from Daytona Beach
​
Seamlessly blend business and celebration — all in one unforgettable space.
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
